H0.text: With which area of manufacturing are 'Linn', 'Martin Logan' and 'Krell' associated. Audio Equipment

H1.text: With which area of manufacturing are 'Linn', 'Martin Logan' and 'Krell' associated. Home Theater Systems

H2.text: With which area of manufacturing are 'Linn', 'Martin Logan' and 'Krell' associated. Luxury Goods

H3.text: With which area of manufacturing are 'Linn', 'Martin Logan' and 'Krell' associated. HiFi

A4.text: MartinLogan released the world's first electrostatic home cinema center-channel speaker and on-wall surround channel speakers, establishing the brand in the emerging home theater market.

A5.text: MartinLogan's next product began to take form in 1997 in the form of the 2000-pound Statement e2 loudspeaker. The design and engineering behind the Statement e2 fueled the next generation of MartinLogan electrostatic speakers

A6.text: Krell Industries, manufacturer of audio systems

A7.text: hi-fi became a generic term for home sound equipment, to some extent displacing phonograph and record player.

A8.text: Audiophiles focused on technical characteristics and bought individual components, such as separate turntables, radio tuners, phono stages, preamplifiers, power amplifiers and loudspeakers.
